title: Sabin: A Seven Novel
description: This is a New Adult Soft SciFi Romance with graphic language and sex that is not suitable for younger readers.*Alert* This novel contains Hot Otherworldly Males. Consider yourself warned.The Seven have a code: find and protect Judgment Day (a weapon of mass destruction that poses as a harmless necklace) and the ones who possess it at all costs; and never, under any circumstances, divulge information about ourselves.I have always complied with this code. Until Serena Callahan, a sassy, no-nonsense female, found the damn choker, and now I’m the one being choked by my own emotions. Ever since the day she entered my life that code has meant nothing to me. And for the life of me I can’t figure out why I’m allowing a damn woman to lead me around by her slender finger. The rules have changed and she’s calling all the shots only she doesn’t know it. But if we can’t find the necklace soon, none of it will matter anyway.My name is Sabin and I am the commander of The Seven.
author: A.M. Hargrove
